page.title: 16FRAN BOX-A day in the life 1
page.content: The{BOX}family live in two converted Edwardian farm cottages -{LISS HURST {COTTAGES}-at Wheatham,West Liss.Her husband,{Martin,}works in the area as Head of the Design Dept. at Bedales School.She teaches at Dunhurst,Bedales Junior School - part-time.They have 3 children.2 attend Liss Primary School, 1 goes to the Bedales creche. During term time,her life is very busy.She gets up at 6.45am to give everyone Breakfast.At 8.35am the school minibus collects the eldest 2, and the rest of the family go off to Bedales. In the early part of the afternoon, when her individual pupils have games,she goes home to do her domestic chores, having collected Henry,her youngest child from the creche.Oliver and Kate, the eldest two, return home from school at 4pm.Between 4 and 6pm she prepares tea while the children play or watch TV.
